title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.20 - Title of proceedings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 347.20 - Title of proceedings

State Regulations

All proceedings brought pursuant to this Part shall be
brought in the name of the local social services district and the State of New

York, as assignee of the ADC recipient. The commissioner of such district may
authorize an employee to verify petitions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
347.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
